Text.Page:
Cultists neglect the land and murder our stewards. See the southwest there? Every day I watch those fat boars root up the plants and foul the soil. Farmland into dust pits! Hogs should be in the woods where they belong. Never would have happened before.

Can't run them off because it's not the army's job! Have me killing my neighbors instead! Nature's upside down.

Kept some money from my last harvest before...this. Kill those {@LinkCreature:17#300050#wary gutspiller warthogs} and {@LinkCreature:17#104#forked tusk warthogs}, and it's yours.
Nature smiles, friend. That was good work. Wish I was still a farmer, a hunter. Money was worth it, just to see them run!
